const TAG_HEADERS = 'HEADERS'

Detailed Description

XHTMLTemplate extention. Representents the Headers tag of an XHTMLPage. Headers are managed with raw XHTML for more simplicity.

Definition at line 39 of file XHTMLHeadersTemplate.php.

instanciates a XHTMLHeadersTemplate. Sets a default skeleton for head tag. Initialises XHTMLTemplate for the raw headers.

XHTMLHeadersTemplate::AddHeaders (  $  headers  ) 
 

Adds raw XHTML $headers to the current headers. Headers of the heads is value associated to the tag TAG_HEADERS.

It automatiquely adds a NEWLINE to the $headers.

Raw XHTML may be correct.

Parameters:
$headers The raw XHTML header(s) to be added.

Definition at line 47 of file XHTMLHeadersTemplate.php.

References Template::AddToTag().

XHTMLHeadersTemplate::SetHeaders (  $  headers  ) 
 

Sets raw XHTML $headers as the current headers. Headers of the heads is value associated to the tag TAG_HEADERS.

Raw XHTML may be correct.

Parameters:
$headers The raw XHTML header(s) to be set.
